name: Rukita [CPS] ID
name_aliases: Rukita, Kost, Kosan, Apartment, AirBNB, Housing, Rumah, Perumahan, sewa rumah, sewa kost, sewa apartemen, sewa apartement, coliving, mewah, fancy, boarding house
description:
Rukita is a proptech company that improves the quality of rental housing in Indonesia by providing lifestyle residences with complete services and superior hospitality. Rukita is now available in 21 major cities spread across Java, Sumatra, and Bali and has served more than 30,000 residents.

In July 2022, Rukita received an award with the title of Best Proptech Start Up - Indonesia at the 2022 Global Brands Magazine Awards. This international award is a recognition of Rukita's commitment to innovation, quality, branding activities, customer service and business performance, as well as the development of a strong proptech system in Indonesia. In the same year, Rukita also received the title of "Best of The Best" at two events at once, namely the Indonesia Customer Service Champions (ICSC) and the Indonesia Digital Marketing Champions (IDMC) organized by SWA Magazine and Business Digest.

The two prestigious awards also helped establish Rukita's position as a market leader in the proptech sector in Indonesia. Thanks to Rukita's commitment to innovation and sustainability aspects, Rukita has again received the title of Promising Startups in Asia from Asia Corporate Excellence and Sustainability (ACES) in 2023.

Campaign Description: Rukita allows the publisher to earn a commission every time a customer checkouts on their website (for apartment, rooms, or houses rent) through Admitad's affiliate link.

Target Geo: Indonesia

Cookie time: 30 days

Allowed Traffic: Mentioned in the traffic sources tab.

Validation Cycle: 30 days

Tracking: Tracking code

Objective: To generate sales for the Rukita Indonesia campaign.

Rukita allows its publisher to earn good revenue if the sale is generated using a publisher link.
